website_summaries.verdict: These bowling shoes are a lightweight and comfortable option that run true to size.
pros: Flexible model that feels natural on feet, even during the first wear
This pair runs true to size
These look more like regular sneakers than bowling shoes
Mesh design makes these extremely breathable and comfortable to wear for long periods
cons: These may be slippery at first, until they are scuffed

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: He. They look nice and comfortable when I tried them on. Wide enough.. but I notice the hard sew line across the toes on the top of the shoe when I bend my foot while bowling. It kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: larryboy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and effective for a nonprofessional bowler just looking to have fun and save money on shoe rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable to wear during her bowling matches
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. They are comfortable to wear during her bowling matches.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional bowler but I joined a team and these shoes are pretty good. Feels like I'm bowling with normal sneakers not a stiff rental shoe
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cote

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and look good too. Wish my bowling was as good!
customer_reviews.author: srm1967

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: **writing from my husband’s amazon account** These are much more attractive in person than I originally thought just seeing the photos. I’m typically a size 8 shoe and ordered an 8 in these bowling shoes, and they fit perfectly. I will update this review after I’ve bowled in them a few times. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K Dorris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They run small I went up a full size... from what I normally wear but I love them! Super comfortable and good priced
customer_reviews.author: sfreeberg13

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality. Glad I ordered a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have a narrow foot they are very comfortable. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: the shoes fit and was of good quality material. Would have liked having a slide pad on the left shoe.
customer_reviews.author: E J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to bowl with these.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these bowling shoes. My first try at sliding on the lane my foot did not slide. I pulled the muscle in my leg. I tried to scuff them up with a wire brush like the lanes use. Nope, I did not slide the following weekat bwling. Was VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KR Strikeforce Nova Lite Women's Bowling Shoe
product_meta.description: This modern designed KR Strikeforce Nova Lite shoe features KR Kanvas uppers that are easier to clean and maintain as well as a silky smooth interior liner that provides better comfort and fit. This shoe also benefits from KR's Komfort-Fit construction and FlexSlide Technology. This is one lightweight, stylish, and comfortable shoe!
feature_bullets: Fully textile lined with padded Tongue and collar
Number 8 microfiber slide pad on both shoes with Flex Slide technology
